settings.heading: Raymond Lee Jewelers: Redefining Luxury, Craftsmanship, and Trust

settings.text: For more than three decades, Raymond Lee Jewelers has been devoted to showcasing extraordinary diamonds, fine jewelry, and timepieces. What began as a family passion has evolved into a trusted South Florida institution, where expertise is passed from one generation to the next. From the sourcing of exceptional stones to the craftsmanship behind every setting, we honor a longstanding commitment to authenticity, integrity, and excellence. At Raymond Lee Jewelers, perfection isn’t a goal—it's our tradition.

settings.title: Our History
settings.content: Since 1983, we have continually strived to achieve customer satisfaction in every aspect of our business. For over two generations, our family-owned jewelry store has been a trusted destination for buying, selling, and trading exquisite jewelry, watches, and diamonds. We take pride in offering on-site jewelry and watch repair services, along with providing high-end collateral loans for fine jewelry and timepieces, all while delivering a warm, personalized experience that reflects our commitment to excellence and integrity. It is our sincere desire that our customers continue to get the best service found anywhere in the country. We do not just want a customer’s business; we want to earn their business. By doing so, a retail relationship of trust is developed and we gain a loyal, lifetime client. Located in affluent Boca Raton, Florida, our 3,200 square foot showroom offers our clients all of the professional services required for buying, selling, and maintaining all of our client’s valuable treasures. Conveniently located in the heart of Boca Raton, we are only minutes from I-95 and the Turnpike. In 2016, we opened our gorgeous, state of the art showroom in East Boca Raton, Diamonds by Raymond Lee. This standalone facility located conveniently on Federal Highway and houses our enormous selection of GIA certified diamonds, luxury timepieces, modern jewelry, engagement rings, and wedding bands all under one roof.

settings.title: Our Mission
settings.content: Raymond Lee Jewelers and Diamonds by Raymond Lee are a successful jewelry retail entity providing comprehensive product and service components to achieve superior customer satisfaction, as well as a service and repair center using highly advanced technology and an extensive, unparalleled inventory appealing to every possible demographic. A value system that provides for ethical practices to develop customer trust and loyalty extends to the beliefs and practices of all associates, management, and owners. Honesty in our dealings, integrity from using best practices, and an atmosphere of elegance and beauty is indicative of the aspirations of all associated with Raymond Lee Jewelers and Diamonds by Raymond Lee and represent our standards for every customer to experience.

settings.text: Years of Experiences Discover and own the diamonds that define your story.

settings.title: Top of the Line Equipment
settings.content: Some high-end watch brands that we service include Audemars Piguet, Rolex, Omega, Cartier, IWC, Movado, Patek Philippe, Rolex, Breguet, Breitling, and many others. Our skillful watchmaker can handle complex watch repairs sc minute repeaters, tourbillons, and chronograph services and repairs.

settings.title: Do you buy pre-owned jewelry, watches, or diamonds?
settings.text: Yes. We offer evaluations for jewelry, watches, and set/loose diamonds. Our experts assess each item based on condition, authenticity, and current market value. We also offer loans on jewelry or trades.

settings.title: What materials are your jewelry pieces made from?
settings.text: We craft our pieces using high-quality materials including, 10k, 14k, and 18k gold, Platinum, and ethically sourced diamonds and gemstones. Each product page lists the exact materials used so you know what you’re purchasing.

settings.title: Do you offer financing or payment plans?
settings.text: Yes we offer financing through Wells Fargo and Synchrony. We also offer 3 month layaway options.

settings.title: Do you offer appraisals?
settings.text: Yes. Our appraisals are performed by a Certified Gemologist who is trained in gem identification, diamond grading, and jewelry valuation. Our expert has credentials from GIA (Gemological Institute of America). Their certification ensures that your jewelry is evaluated accurately and according to industry standards.

settings.title: What is your return and exchange policy?
settings.text: Our return policy is 14 days after purchasing. We also offer exchanges/trades on purchases, please visit our store to discuss your options.
Free Shipping Free 2 day shipping on all online orders
Customer Support 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
